head.title: Page Not Found - Dilworth Paxson LLP
Dilworth Paxson LLP

td.noscript: Featured Lawyer - Elizabeth GoldsteinMs. Goldstein focuses her practice on business law, including entity selection and formation; licensing agreements; contract law; business sales and purchases; and tax matters. She also advises business clients on executive and director compensation matters such as deferred compensation and restricted stock plans. Learn More >>

div.SCRIPT:
var fl_randNum = $("#tnb_l_img").drawRandContent(new Array("","","","","")); $("#tnb_l_txt").drawRandContent(new Array("
Featured Lawyer - Elizabeth GoldsteinMs. Goldstein focuses her practice on business law, including entity selection and formation; licensing agreements; contract law; business sales and purchases; and tax matters. She also advises business clients on executive and director compensation matters such as deferred compensation and restricted stock plans. Learn More >>","
Featured Lawyer - James Kevin WholeyMr. Wholey has broad experience at the intersection of Federal government affairs and business, in particular with the legislative and policy processes relating to investment, trade and international business development. Learn More >>","
Featured Lawyer - Matthew Ian WhitehornMr. Whitehorn is a partner in Dilworth Paxson’s Employee Benefits Group, Labor and Employment Group, Middle Market/Emerging Company Group, Health Care Group, and Tax Group, as well as a member of the Corporate Department. He is also the Chairman of Dilworth Paxson's Pro Bono Committee. Learn More >>","
Featured Lawyer - Darren L. SmithDarren Smith focuses his practice on general litigation matters, including those involving state and local government entities.
Learn More >>","
Featured Lawyer - Joseph C. RudolfJoseph Rudolf practices exclusively in the field of labor and employment law. Since 1985 he has devoted a significant portion of his time to the public sector, management side and has represented more than 300 Pennsylvania public employers. Learn More >>"), fl_randNum);

ul.li:
<a href="../Industries/Automotive" class="roTextA" roText="The attorneys at Dilworth Paxson LLP have extensive experience in representing vehicle manufacturers and distributors in a wide variety of dealer franchise and licensing matters. Our experience ranges from long-standing representation of one of the largest automobile manufacturers/distributors in the world, to representing small specialty vehicle manufacturers and distributors in matters before state vehicle and licensing boards.
">Automotive

a.roText: The mid-Atlantic region is a hotbed of the American biotechnology industry, with several major medical schools, numerous research universities and colleges, many established companies in the pharmaceutical, medical device, and diagnostics industries, and an ever-increasing number of startup entities. Being home to so diverse an array of professionals, the Philly region also attracts the attention of entities that interact with biotechnology professionals and their organizations.
Dilworth Paxson serves clients ranging from primary schools to universities throughout the Mid-Atlantic region.
Dilworth Paxson’s Energy group has provided counsel to some of the world’s largest utility companies and fuel distributors.
Our Family Office clientele have significant interests in family owned or controlled businesses.
Dilworth Paxson’s lawyers advise both public and private sector clients in financial transactions and other matters related to infrastructure in various sectors.

ul.li:
<a href="../Industries/Media" class="roTextA" roText="
The firm has represented print and broadcast media companies, film production companies, music companies, technology companies and other “new” media companies, and individual members of the media.">Media

a.roText: Dilworth Paxson has served many clients on transportation-related matters, including representation of regional transportation authorities and support of infrastructure development projects.

div.div: The attorneys at Dilworth Paxson LLP have extensive experience in representing vehicle manufacturers and distributors in a wide variety of dealer franchise and licensing matters. Our experience ranges from long-standing representation of one of the largest automobile manufacturers/distributors in the world, to representing small specialty vehicle manufacturers and distributors in matters before state vehicle and licensing boards.

a.roText: Dilworth Paxson’s lawyers advise clients on antitrust issues at every stage of their business and have experience at all stages of litigation, whether in the courtroom, in pre-trial settings, or in class action settlements.

ul.li:
<a href="../Practices/BankingFinancialServices" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson’s Banking & Financial Services Group regularly represents banks, finance companies, national and regional mortgage lenders, savings associations, credit unions, and other financial institutions in a wide variety of lending and other financing transactions.">Banking & Financial Services

<a href="../Practices/BankruptcyInsolvency" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson’s Bankruptcy & Insolvency Group is one of the largest bankruptcy, debtor, and creditor rights and insolvency practices in the Philadelphia region. The Group is unique in that our lawyers regularly represent commercial borrowers and debtors, secured lenders, unsecured trade creditors, and Chapter 7 and 11 trustees in a wide variety of industries and cases. ">Bankruptcy & Insolvency

<a href="../Practices/Business" class="roTextA" roText="
The firm's business practice ranges from structuring and carrying out complex and sophisticated transactions, both domestic and international, to providing daily guidance to our clients on matters involving business governance, commercial dealings, regulatory issues, and business relationships.">Business

<a href="../Practices/CorporateInvestigationsWhiteCollar" class="roTextA" roText="
The Corporate Investigations/White Collar Group has handled all aspects of criminal matters, including conducting internal investigations; representing witnesses and targets in grand jury investigations; stewarding clients through parallel criminal and civil proceedings; trial and appeals.">Corporate Investigations/White Collar

<a href="../Practices/EmployeeBenefits" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson’s Employee Benefits Group assists its clients to achieve their business goals in a manner consistent with the ever-changing requirements of federal agencies.">Employee Benefits

a.roText: Government affairs attorneys assist client with complex permitting, regulatory enforcement and compliance issues, economic development and redevelopment incentives, government contracts and administrative litigation as well as traditional advocacy at all levels of government.

Dilworth Paxson's Health Care Group brings an integrated approach to the challenges of today's competitive health care environment. In addition to our full-time Health Care attorneys, our Group includes attorneys from several disciplines within the firm, such as public finance, tax and non-profits, litigation, bankruptcy and insolvency, real estate, labor & employment, and corporate.

An experienced Immigration practice with a national scope, Dilworth Paxson represents clients seeking non-immigrant and immigrant visas through family, employment, and investment, including investment in USCIS certified regional centers under the EB-5 Immigrant Investor Visa Program.

Dilworth Paxson's Insurance Coverage Group handles litigation in administrative forums and courts and insurance coverage questions. As a rule, the Group generally does not handle claims defense litigation.

ul.li:
<a href="../Practices/IntellectualProperty" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson’s Intellectual Property Group provides a multidisciplinary approach to meeting a clients’ intellectual property needs. To cost effectively leverage the skills and experience of the professionals involved in a particular matter, intellectual property matters are staffed not only with seasoned lawyers in patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets, but also with lawyers experienced in corporate structuring, tax, finance, labor and employment, litigation, or other legal disciplines the clients’ required.">Intellectual Property

a.roText: Dilworth Paxson’s Labor & Employment Group represents our clients’ in a variety of matters including discrimination and retaliation based on race, age sex, sexual orientation, disability, and USERRA status.
Dilworth Paxson's Litigation Department lawyers are skilled strategic thinkers who provide strong and effective representation to their clients to help them meet their business objectives.

ul.li:
<a href="../Practices/MediaLaw" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson’s Media Law Group focuses on defending the First Amendment rights of our clients. Our lawyers work with editors and reporters on a daily basis, providing counsel from the newsroom to the courtroom on a wide range of issues.">Media Law

<a href="../Practices/MergersAcquisitions" class="roTextA" roText="
Our Mergers & Acquisitions practice group represents public and private businesses and individuals in public and private M&A transactions throughout the United States. We have represented client in transactions ranging in size from under one million dollars to in excess of $3 billion.">Mergers & Acquisitions

<a href="../Practices/PhilanthropicNonprofit" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson’s Philanthropic & Nonprofit Group provides our clients with a comprehensive understanding of the complexities involved with operating a tax-exempt organization so that with our guidance, they can make informed and educated decisions about the direction of their organization.">Philanthropic & Nonprofit

<a href="../Practices/Procurement" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth’s Procurement Practice Group has deep and extensive experience with major procurements throughout the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania over the past 25 years. These representations require significant knowledge of the procuring agency’s enabling legislation and procurement policies, federal and state procurement law and regulations, and related laws.">Procurement

<a href="../Practices/PublicFinance" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson is a nationally recognized Red Book bond counsel firm. Our lawyers have worked on an array of municipal bond issues.
">Public Finance

<a href="../Practices/RealEstate" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson’s real estate practice includes the preparation, negotiation, and review of documentation relating to all aspects of commercial, industrial and residential acquisition and development, leasing, commercial lending, including real estate workouts, and zoning and land use.">Real Estate

<a href="../Practices/Securities" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson’s Securities Group counsels on a broad range of matters including transactional (both domestic and international), regulatory and compliance matters, federal and state court litigation, administrative agency proceedings, and criminal defense. ">Securities

<a href="../Practices/Tax" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson's Tax Group focuses on tax planning and tax controversy, and assists with federal, state and local tax planning issues including mergers and acquisitions; partnerships; pension and employee benefits; tax insurance underwriting; Chapter 11; real estate and other investment syndications.">Tax

<a href="../Practices/TrustsEstates" class="roTextA" roText="
Dilworth Paxson's Trusts & Estates Group counsels executors, trustees, and guardians concerning estate and trust administration, fiduciaries with property in several jurisdictions and countries, and trustees and directors of charitable organizations.">Trusts & Estates

div.div: Dilworth Paxson’s lawyers advise clients on antitrust issues at every stage of their business and have experience at all stages of litigation, whether in the courtroom, in pre-trial settings, or in class action settlements.

td.a: Philadelphia Inquirer, Daily News and Philly.com Acquisition
D’Anastasio Corp. v. Township of Pennsauken
Defense of Alter Ego/Single Employer Liability

div.p:
We’re sorry but the page you requested is not available at this time or is no longer available on this site.
Please click here to return to the home page.
Thank you

Our Web site's search function employs a variety of techniques to help you make the most of your queries. In this tips section we use square brackets [ ] to signal queries, so [antitrust and litigation] is one query, while [antitrust] and [litigation] are two.

ul.li: Exact phrases: Eliminate unnecessary search results by surrounding your search phrase with quotation marks. Placing ["project finance"] in quotes will return specific results and discard additional results that simply have the words "project" and "finance" peppered on a page.

Wildcard symbol: If you're not exactly sure how a piece of information you want is phrased, use the following symbol (*) as a word root expander. A search for [child*] will find not only "child," but also results with words like "children" and "childhood."
